newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Cimpor share pre-registration from Sept 23.
newsitem.headline: Cimpor share pre-registration from Sept 23.

text.p: The pre-registration phase for the coming privatisation of state-controlled cement firm Cimpor-Cimentos de Portugal will run from September 23 to October 4, the company said.

Investors will be able to declare their interest during this period and increase their chances of getting stock, it said in a statement. The government is selling off 45 percent of Cimpor, but it has still not said how much of the stake will be offered directly to institutional investors and how much will be offered on the market.
The conclusion of the privatisation process is set for October 15 when the results will be announced on the Lisbon bourse.
